txt.en: 'Hurry! Take the mortar and make the repairs before the fissures expand. It's only a matter of time before the wall is breached.'
'That's one less task to concern me. Perhaps that will fix the problems with the water supply they've been reporting down at Noglond, the way-station in the Vale.'
'The canal is leaking into the tunnels beneath the Hall of Merchants. Hurry and patch the fractures!'
A fissure has opened in the great dwarf-canal leading down from Thorin's Hall, threatening to flood the Vale of Thr√°in.
Seal the fissure with Tindr's mortar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Enter Thorin's Hall to the north, then go west to the Hall of Merchants.\n\nTindr gave you some mortar with which to repair the cracks in the canal walls.
Tindr is in the courtyard outside Thorin's Hall.\n\nThe fissure was sealed. You should return to Tindr with news of your success.
